_sText:
Well, its here. The long awaited port. Its been 11 months, wow. Anyways, to the 2 people who will actually have fun on this map here you go. The start zone is on the spawn building, NOT the red platform. 

The last screen shot shows a secret ladder, i know 99% of people wont want to walk the stairs, so there you go. 

Thanks to everyone who helped me in the csgo version. 

I will probably do chapter 2 at some point, i love this game :).
